item.description:
Join me for a much needed break in the week!

Nestled between routes 146 and routes 123, Lincoln Woods State Park is one of Blackstone Valley's great treasures. A short ride from Providence, Pawtucket, and Cumberland, it is a popular get away for northeastern Rhode Islanders. Nice wooded trails around Olney Pond.

After we'll head for local beer and burger. Good leashed dogs welcome! Rain cancels.

Where to meet: Parking log off the 146 entrance of right of manned booth. (Not the covered bridge entrance)Please try to be on time, we have limited time for walking as the sun is going down earlier and earlier - boo hoo!
Call if your going to be late 508-415-0590
item.name: Mid-Week Mini Hike and Beer & Burger
